scripts.deploy:sandbox:hotswap: npm run clean && npm run package:sandbox && NODE_ENV=sandbox cdk deploy --hotswap --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:sandbox:full: npm run clean && npm run package:sandbox && NODE_ENV=sandbox cdk deploy --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run clean && npm run package && NODE_ENV=prod cdk deploy
scripts.destroy:sandbox: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=sandbox cdk destroy --all
scripts.package:sandbox: cd php && npm run build && composer install --classmap-authoritative && bin/console cache:clear --env=prod && bin/console cache:warmup --env=prod && sleep 1
scripts.package: cd php && npm run build && composer install --classmap-authoritative --no-dev && bin/console cache:clear --env=prod && bin/console cache:warmup --env=prod && sleep 1
